title: OpenAI Apps SDK Fuels New In-Chat Experiences
summary: Developers showcase app components and MCP servers to bring rich UIs inside ChatGPT.
body: The Apps SDK allows apps to render interactive components in ChatGPT while tools are provided via MCP servers. Early demos include listings, dashboards, and builder workflows.
author: Alex Rivera

title: FastMCP Simplifies MCP Server Development
summary: A Pythonic framework reduces boilerplate and speeds up deploying MCP servers.
body: FastMCP adds decorators, resource helpers, and deployment conveniences for building production MCP servers quickly.
author: Samir Kulkarni

title: Local Tech Conference Highlights AI Tooling
summary: Workshops walk developers through MCP and Apps SDK integrations.
body: Hands-on sessions demonstrated how to connect MCP tools to app components, including placard cards and news lists.
author: Priya Nair
